meanings.definition: A type of roundworm that is parasitic in plants.
meanings.sent1: Farmers use nemas to protect their crops from harmful pests.
meanings.sent2: The nemas in the soil help keep the plants healthy.
meanings.sent3: The nemas threw a party in the garden, inviting all the plant pests to join them.
meanings.sent4: The nemas worked tirelessly underground, like tiny garden protectors.
meanings.sent5: The nemas wriggled through the soil, hunting down plant enemies.

meanings.sent1: A school of nemas swam gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent2: The nemas gathered together to form a powerful force.
meanings.sent3: The nemas held a meeting to discuss their next move in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent4: The nemas stood united, a force to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The nemas moved in harmony, like a synchronized swimming team.

meanings.sent1: Gardeners rely on nemas to maintain the balance of the soil ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: The nemas burrowed deep into the earth, unseen but essential.
meanings.sent3: The nemas organized an underground race, much to the surprise of the earthworms.
meanings.sent4: The nemas navigated the soil like tiny explorers on a mission.
meanings.sent5: The nemas thrived in the darkness of the soil, unseen but vital to plant health.
